resume.workfield: I am currently working as a CTO for Orion
resume.description: I have been working in the web industry for 10 years. I am hands-on and have grown different products for entities (startups, companies, charities and public) from MVP to acquisition or handover. I worked on B2C, B2B and Back-office web applications. I thrive in fast paced products environments, and am keen on being user centric.

current.title: CTO @ Orion - Beta.gouv.fr
current.productGoal: We leverage French Open Data to analyze students outcome in vocational education and derive impact KPIs for the training programs they completed. We allowed the needs of vocational high schools to emerge through their principals and built a workflow upon it to shape the vocational training offer in coherence with national ambitions (Ministries, Directorate General for School Education).
current.myRole: I am in charge of the technical team, contractors and delivery. I am also responsible for the technical solution handover to the National Ministery of Education after incubation within beta.gouv.

tasks.text: I co-plan budget (1.4M) and bi-anual roadmaps
I contributed to steering and funding comitees with stakeholders

past.title: Tech Lead @ Seekube
past.productGoal: We enabled online job datings for public & private universities. We aimed at building a smooth process for both organizers (schools) and participants (companies and students). Unsurprisingly the product user base grew a lot during COVID.
past.myRole: I was responsible for the technical team processes during a period of significant user and client growth (x10 in 1,5 years) and driving the product handover following the acquisition.
